docs.summary:
The wix-search-backend module contains functionality for working with your
 site's indexing service from backend code.
description: To use the Search API, import `wixSearch` from the `wix-search-backend` module:

params.name: includeCollections
params.doc:
app collections to search.
 [ {appDefId_1:[collectionName1, collectionName2]}, {appDefId_2:[collectionName1, collectionName2]}, {"":[collectionName3]}]
 empty appDefId mean any

params.name: excludeCollections
params.doc:
app collections to exclude from search, have higher precedence than includeCollections, optional.
 [ {appDefId_10:[]}, {"":[collectionName5]}]
     empty appDefId_1 mean any

params.name: orderByCollections
params.doc:
app collections to order by, optional.
[ {appDefId_1:[ collectionName2]}, {appDefId_2:[collectionName2]}]

docs.summary: Gets the matched items from the collection.
